0.2.name: wordpress/more-mime-type-filters
0.2.description:
In the Media Library, there are a few convenient filter links (Images | Audio | Video). This plugin allows you to add other types to that list. For example, you could add a PDFs link to easily find all PDFs in the Media Library.

May require at least 2.8.6 (definitely doesn't work on anything older than that)

  • I'm on twitter
